description:
Kayano Hiromu’s parents divorced soon after Hiromu was born, so he was raised by his grandparents. He felt like he was abandoned by his parents and he wasn’t good at socialising, until they sent him to an elite all-boys boarding school.

A sweet and sour love story unfolds at Tōei Private Academy Secondary School,

At the same time, various problems have occurred…>
